posts.postText:
Sup guys.  I'm back with another release.

If you don't know, I created ttt_shippingcenter, ttt_digdown, ttt_concentration, and ttt_cloverfield.  Now this map, ttt_slumcity.

This map is dedicated to another community, but I like to get my map out for others to play!

 Download: 

 http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=118066 

----
 http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/8981/tttslumcityb10000.jpg 

 http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6046/tttslumcityb10001.jpg 

 http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/1386/tttslumcityb10002.jpg 

 http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/8964/tttslumcityb10003.jpg 

 http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/3852/tttslumcityb10004.jpg 

 http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/851/tttslumcityb10005.jpg 

 http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/573/tttslumcityb10006.jpg 

 http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/3371/tttslumcityb10007.jpg 

 http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/6244/tttslumcityb10008.jpg

(Hard to see in screenshot, but the below picture is a section of the spectator room)

 http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/8729/tttslumcityb10009.jpg
Oh goodie, a new map for me to climb out of >:3
Always gotta be a gloomy dark map....

>> Always gotta be a gloomy dark map.... 

Always will be.

>> >> Always gotta be a gloomy dark map.... 

Always will be. 
Make a gloomy dark map, with  snow :D 

But, of course, I will add this. It looks good. Nice work.

The map does look good.

When is map being added? (Today say today plz plz plz)

Other than that, make a map with thunderstorms :D if possible :D

>> The map does look good.

When is map being added? (Today say today plz plz plz)

Other than that, make a map with thunderstorms :D if possible :D 
I added it when I posted. ;)
Also, i'd like to thank you for posting your work on the forum, it's glad to see a map-maker with interest on getting his work out, even in this method.
Personally, I'd like to see a map with weather that affects gameplay (i.e. Storm)

>> Personally, I'd like to see a map with weather that affects gameplay (i.e. Storm) 
That would be an intense map to play on.

Though, this map does look amazing dude, good luck in any future maps you make :D

>> >> Personally, I'd like to see a map with weather that affects gameplay (i.e. Storm) 
That would be an intense map to play on.

Though, this map does look amazing dude, good luck in any future maps you make :D 

Yeah a map, where lightning randomly strike down and could damage / kill a player. that would be interesting

or maybe, meteor showers that comes every 2 mins. would damage / kill people. 
then maybe random times it will rain and heal players. or maybe acid rain does damage. lol

>It starts to rain
>10 seconds to get inside before lightning strikes
>???
>profit

>> >> >> Personally, I'd like to see a map with weather that affects gameplay (i.e. Storm) 
That would be an intense map to play on.

Though, this map does look amazing dude, good luck in any future maps you make :D 

Yeah a map, where lightning randomly strike down and could damage / kill a player. that would be interesting

or maybe, meteor showers that comes every 2 mins. would damage / kill people. 
then maybe random times it will rain and heal players. or maybe acid rain does damage. lol 

I think that would be awesome. Anything that gives you a sense of urgency when you're out in the open. Even if it was just the acid rain. I would thoroughly love that map.
